title: 50 First Dates

description: A con artist's scheme to steal a diamond goes awry when she falls for one of her accomplices.

description: Two teenagers with emotional scars help each other heal and find hope in their lives.

description: A businessman is ordered to attend an anger management program after an incident on a flight.

description: A baby is kidnapped by criminals but manages to escape and embarks on an adventurous day out.

description: A mild-mannered man becomes involved with a charismatic stranger who leads him down a dangerous path.

title: Before Sunrise
description: Two strangers meet on a train and spend a night walking around Vienna, forming a deep connection.

description: A spoiled man must repeat grades 1-12 to inherit his father's fortune.

description: A half-vampire hunts vampires to protect humans from the undead.

description: Blade teams up with vampire hunters to fight a new breed of super vampires.

description: A romantic relationship blossoms between a teenager and an older man in 1980s Italy.
